name: soft-sand
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Ground moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Ground-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a loose, silky sand that boosts the power of Ground-type moves.
